description: Apache Log4j2 JNDI features do not protect against attacker controlled LDAP and other JNDI related endpoints. CVE-2021-44228
FasterXML jackson-databind through 2.12.1 allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a large depth of nested objects. CVE-2020-36518
Apache Commons Collections InvokerTransformer code execution vulnerability. CVE-2015-6420
Apache HttpClient versions prior to 4.5.14 are vulnerable to response header injection attacks. CVE-2022-45868
JJWT versions before 0.10.0 allow signature bypass via algorithm confusion attack. CVE-2019-7644
Google Gson versions before 2.8.9 are vulnerable to deserialization attacks. CVE-2022-25647
MySQL Connector/J allows attackers to access sensitive information via deserialization. CVE-2023-21971
Spring Boot versions before 3.0.6 have a potential security issue in web starter. CVE-2023-20861
Apache Kafka clients may be vulnerable to man-in-the-middle attacks in certain configurations. CVE-2023-25194
PostgreSQL JDBC driver versions before 42.5.5 have potential security issues with connection handling. CVE-2023-32731
